snippet.title: Jesse van Ruller \- The Complete Solos at the Crow
snippet.description: Nov 20, 2012 - Time Flies. Way back, on december 12 2000, we had Jesse van Ruller at the Crow. ... What I did in the vid below is cut away everything except his solos, glue them together and normalize and enhance the sound. The clips ...

snippet.title: Fusion Guitar: Straight-ahead and Contemporary Guitar ...
snippet.description: Each solo is jammed full of inventive licks and patterns to use as building blocks and jumping-off points for creating dynamic jazz guitar solos. Comping patterns and chord voicings are included.

snippet.title: But Beautiful: A Book about Jazz
snippet.description: Ben Webster, Chet Baker, Bud Powell, and Art Pepper are also here, and throughout the book is Duke Ellington as he crosses the country with Harry Carney.

snippet.title: Happy End: A Melodrama with Songs
Jazz: America's Classical Music
snippet.description: Jazz: America’s Classical Music is a delightful introduction and guide to this complex and compelling music and to its rich history.
